tool_description: Detect bot among Twitter users. After that find out which account has an important role in spreading information.
title: Bot Detection

api_list.name: botDetect
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bot-detection1.p.rapidapi.com/user/username"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bot-detection1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
